whatIs.title: What is Ghibli Style Video Converter?
whatIs.description: The Ghibli Style Video Converter utilizes AI technology to transform everyday videos into rich, Ghibli-themed animations. By applying a two-step process, it maintains original motion while adding Ghibli charm. Select from hundreds of artistic influences, including Studio Ghibli, to create transformed videos that are uniquely captivating.

howToUse.title: How to Use Ghibli Style Video Converter

steps.title: Upload Your Video
steps.content: Quickly upload your video files in formats such as MP4, MOV, or AVI, up to 15 seconds and 50MB for Ghibli-style processing. Longer content is automatically trimmed.

steps.title: Video Style Transfer Reference
steps.content: Our tool extracts the initial frame and applies the Ghibli style to serve as a constant point of reference during the transformation process.

steps.title: Choose Artistic Style
steps.content: Select from our diverse array of styles, including iconic Ghibli themes, or customize styles using personalized text prompts or reference images.

steps.title: Generate Ghibli Style Video
steps.content: Watch your entire video transform using our AI-powered Ghibli reference frame, retaining the nuances of expression and timing while adding a signature Ghibli aesthetic.
